nodes.text: Taquana was a member of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing during the Galactic Civil War. While the unit, aboard the bulk freighter Yadeez, was stationed with a large amount of Imperial loyalist forces at the planet Jakku in 5 ABY, the members of the 204th took part in a war game with some allied Imperial forces there. Prior to his departure from the fighter wing, Colonel Soran Keize praised Taquana's performance in the combat exercises.
Taquana was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, the final volume of the Star Wars: Alphabet Squadron trilogy written by Alexander Freed.
